title: Xi's speech at symposium with representatives from education, culture, health, sports sectors published
content:
BEIJING, Sept. 24 (Xinhua) -- A speech by President Xi Jinping at a symposium attended by experts and representatives from China's education, culture, health and sports sectors has been published.
Xi, also general secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee and chairman of the Central Military Commission, delivered the speech at the symposium on Tuesday.
The booklet, published by the People's Publishing House, is available at Xinhua Bookstore outlets across the country. Enditem
